entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add support for checkbox by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/157
  • add copy button under code blocks by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/157
  • replace icons by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/157
  • Update css exposed files, variables, themes and documentation by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/159
  • Make sure tasks folder exist when created using ENV by @Tommatheussen in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/158
  • Add different view modes by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/160
  • Ignore lanes and cards whose names start with dot by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/165
  • Refactor tags to use brackets by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/167
  • Add due date by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/167
  • Add tree structure by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/170
  • Rerender UI when files change outside the app by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/175

New Contributors

  • @Tommatheussen made their first contribution in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/compare/2.5.4...3.0.0
